Name: Macro Chain Redux
Author: Aida Enna (Original version by Caraxi)
Punchline: Run multiple macros one after the other (or repeat them).
Description:
Allows for a macro to continue onto the next macro by using '/nextmacro' on the last line of a macro.
Adding '/nextmacro' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #02
Adding '/nextmacro down' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #11
Also allows executing any macro from chat using '/runmacro'
You can repeat a macro by using /runmacro inside the macro followed by the number of the macro you're editing
Using '/macrocancel' will stop the currently running macro
